api_list.name: Get Earnings
api_list.description: Fetch earnings for multiple hotspots in one of the supported currencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://helium-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/earningsv2"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helium-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get supported currencies
api_list.description: API to fetch a list of supported currencies and their corresponding currency codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://helium-monitor.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/currencies"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helium-monitor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests
